attributes.action: Renewable energy Mexico small and poor communities
attributes.additional_details:
My name is Giorgio, and I am the Director of SEED México, witch is a program of sustainable social and economic development in small and poor communities in México.

We work all over the country, focus mightily in the state of Oaxaca.

Actually we are developing a plan for two communities, in witch in both we have a project of converting this two communities 100% in renewable energy communities. Our idea is start with this two communities, and then expand it to all the rest we are working for.

This communities beside they are poor and isolated, they are an example to most of the rich countries, about
sustainable development, and preservation of nature and land resources.

Building 100% green energy communities, will stay in line for what they are, and will help them to develop social and economically.
